content:
TITLE: Starting Next.js Development Server
DESCRIPTION: Commands to start the Next.js development server using different package managers (npm, yarn, or pnpm). The server will run on localhost:3000 by default.
SOURCE: https://github.com/episerver/cms-saas-vercel-demo/blob/main/apps/frontend/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
# or
pnpm dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Environment Variable for Automatic Cache Purging in Vercel
DESCRIPTION: Configuration of the SITE_DOMAIN environment variable that points to the correct domain for webhook invocation when content is published, enabling automatic cache purging.
SOURCE: https://github.com/episerver/cms-saas-vercel-demo/blob/main/docs/editing.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
SITE_DOMAIN=my-project.vercel.app
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Environment Variables Configuration Table
DESCRIPTION: Table defining the required environment variables for deploying the Optimizely CMS demo site to Vercel, including CMS URL and Content Graph credentials.
SOURCE: https://github.com/episerver/cms-saas-vercel-demo/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Environment variable | Instruction |
| - | - |
| OPTIMIZELY_CMS_URL | The URL where the Optimizely CMS can be reached by the build process; for example: `https://example.cms.optimizely.com/`
| OPTIMIZELY_GRAPH_SECRET | The Content Graph Secret can be made visible on the CMS Dashboard, within the "Render Content" section. |
| OPTIMIZELY_GRAPH_APP_KEY | The Content Graph App key, which is shown on the CMS Dashboard, within the "Render Content" section. |
| OPTIMIZELY_GRAPH_SINGLE_KEY | The Content Graph Single key	, which is shown on the CMS Dashboard, within the "Render Content" section. |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Dependencies Table in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Table listing the main framework and library dependencies used in the project
SOURCE: https://github.com/episerver/cms-saas-vercel-demo/blob/main/docs/solution/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Framework / Library | Purpose |
| --- | --- |
| [Next.JS](https://nextjs.org/) | Main frontend framework for the website |
| [NextAuth.js](https://next-auth.js.org/) | Frontend authentication framework |
| [Apollo Client](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/react/) | GraphQL Client |
| [GraphQL Code Generator](https://the-guild.dev/graphql/codegen) | GraphQL typings and function generators |
| [TailwindCSS](https://tailwindcss.com/) / [Headless UI](https://headlessui.com/) | Styling framework
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Folder Structure Table in Markdown
DESCRIPTION: Table describing the monorepo structure and workspace components of the Optimizely DXP demo implementation
SOURCE: https://github.com/episerver/cms-saas-vercel-demo/blob/main/docs/solution/index.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
| Folder | Type | workspace | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [apps/frontend](../../apps/frontend/README.md) | Next.JS Application | `frontend` | The main Next.JS based frontend application |
| [packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-cli](../../packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-cli/README.md) | Package | `@remkoj/optimizely-dxp-cli` | A helper package that adds developer productivity tools, as well as building tools specific to Optimizely CMS. |
| [packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-nextjs](../../packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-nextjs/README.md) | Package | `@remkoj/optimizely-dxp-nextjs` | Next.JS Specific components and helpers for the Frontend |
| [packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-react](../../packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-react/README.md) | Package | `@remkoj/optimizely-dxp-react` | React components and helpers for both server and client side |
| [packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-react-server](../../packages/remkoj/optimizely-dxp-react-server/README.md) | Package | `@remkoj/optimizely-dxp-react-server` | Server Side React components and helpers |
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Markdown Title Definition
DESCRIPTION: Repository name header in markdown format.
SOURCE: https://github.com/episerver/cms-saas-vercel-demo/blob/main/packages/remkoj-optimizely-fx-nextjs-cli/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
# remkoj-optimizely-fx-nextjs-cli
```
